Posts.Content: Mar 5, 2014 06:38PM jlow51 wrote: Big D, I am fair w/red hair. I had 28 treatments. The nurses told me to prepare to burn. I used Aquaphor, religiously. Had very little burn. Be sure to slather on whatever you choose and continue for two weeks after treatment is over. The radiated skin will continue to burn. Hope you have great results!!
